AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon: Defendant who allegedly transported aliens with Williams, identified by De La Cruz and Hernandez-Gomez as the person motioning for them to hide, argued against the conspiracy conviction and had his transportation convictions affirmed, seeking a reduction in offense level due to minimal or minor participation, denied a § 3B1.2 adjustment
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: Individual allegedly transporting aliens with McMillon, part of the conspiracy, testified at sentencing that McMillon did not recruit her but they entered a joint partnership, gave consent to open the door during the checkpoint stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon and Zeba Williams: Defendants who allegedly transported aliens together, subject of the conspiracy conviction, entered a joint partnership to smuggle aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Luis Pena: Government agent narrating the checkpoint stop, testified at the jury trial, asked Williams to open the door without ordering him to do so
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Manuel Hernandez: Government agent narrating the checkpoint stop, testified at the jury trial
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz: Unlawful alien testifying at trial, identified McMillon as the person motioning for them to hide, arranged to pay thousands of dollars to be smuggled into the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Miguel Hernandez-Gomez: Unlawful alien testifying at trial, identified McMillon as the person motioning for them to hide, arranged to pay thousands of dollars to be smuggled into the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Luis Pena and Manuel Hernandez: agents who conducted the checkpoint stop and search of the tractor-trailer, testified about the events during the suppression hearing
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Martinez-Fuerte: referenced in a legal context regarding checkpoint stops and detentions
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Eric Camacho: Border Patrol Agent testifying about how aliens or their families commonly pay smugglers indirectly, provided evidence supporting the pecuniary purpose special finding
